alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 19 at 9:37PM MST until November 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, heaviest in the Tushar Range and near Brian Head. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including SR-20 and SR-143. Travel may become difficult on untreated, seasonal roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
